Saskatoon Durga Puja Celebration Committee

Celebrating Bengali culture, traditions, and festivals in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada

About Us

The Saskatoon Durga Puja Celebration Committee (SDPCC) is a non-profit Bengali cultural community based in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. For over 55 years, our community has celebrated Durga Puja, Saraswati Puja, and other cultural events, keeping our heritage alive and passing traditions to future generations.
